# Modelos predictivos:

## Modelo Equal-pay-for-Equal-Worl (conditional) [falta Relab]

$$ log(w) = \beta_1 + \beta_2Female + \beta_3Education + \beta_4Age + \beta_5Age^2 + \beta_5Formality + \beta_6Business Size + \gamma_1Oficio + u $$

## Modelo predictivos

### 1. Experiencia en lugar de edad

$$ log(w) = \beta_1 + \beta_2Female + \beta_3Education + \beta_4Experience + \beta_5Experience^2 + \beta_6Formality + \beta_7Business Size + \gamma_1Oficio + u $$

### 2. Interacción experiencia X educación

$$ log(w) = \beta_1 + \beta_2Female + \beta_3Education + \beta_4Experience + \beta_5Experience^2 + \beta_6Education*Experience  +\beta_7Formality + \beta_8Business Size + \gamma_1Oficio + u $$

### 3. Inclusión nivel socioeconómico

$$ log(w) = \beta_1 + \beta_2Female + \beta_3Education + \beta_4Experience + \beta_5Experience^2 + \beta_6Education*Experience  +\beta_7Formality + \beta_8Business Size + \beta_9SES + \gamma_1Oficio + u $$

### 4. 

$$ log(w) = \beta_1 + \beta_2Female + \beta_3Education + \beta_4Age + \beta_5Age^2 + \beta_5Formality + \beta_6Business Size + \gamma_1Oficio + u $$

### 5.

$$ log(w) = \beta_1 + \beta_2Female + \beta_3Education + \beta_4Age + \beta_5Age^2 + \beta_5Formality + \beta_6Business Size + \gamma_1Oficio + u $$
